lcInstruction.p: learningContentbody: containing element for the other elements within the body of this topic type; specialized from <body>; analogous to <conbody>, <taskbody>, etc.
lcInstruction: containing element for the instructional content in that lesson topic. Can include conceptual information, examples, activities, exercises, etc.

ul.li: lcIntro (introduces the lesson topic, often with a detailed description or instructor notes that <shortdesc> may not adequately cover)
lcDuration (estimates the length of time it should take the student to read all materials and/or complete all activities within the topic)
lcObjectives (lists specific objectives, or things the student should know/be able to do after completing the lesson topic)
lcChallenge (explains what you want the student to practice)
